addExperiences.name: DoctorLive
description: DoctorLive is my final year college project.
We aimed to bridge the communication gap between doctors, patients and chemists.
Patients are provided with a mobile app through which they can book appointments, receive reports, receive health reminders and connect with doctors.
Doctors & hospitals have an Azure dashboard by which they can send the health reports and connect with patients digitally.
Chemists receive the list of medicines direcly from hospital and deliver them to patient.
This project was selected at Microsoft //publish/ 2014 event at Bangalore for National Finals.

addExperiences.name: API Docs
description: API Docs was created to maintain APIs for other projects I was working on.
This is an alternate to swagger editor to create and store APIs. Instead of writing YAML codes, all I had to do was to fill a simple CRUD form.
